## OWebKeyStorage.getItem() method

Returns a given key value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getItem<T extends OJSONValue>(key: string): T | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | The key name. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T \| null
